## Quick Start

Bootstrap a new project:

```sh
# npm
npx wxt@latest init

# pnpm
pnpm dlx wxt@latest init

# bun
bunx wxt@latest init
```

Or see the [installation guide](https://wxt.dev/guide/installation.html) to get started with WXT.
